Title: AjaxControlToolKitEx
Description: To provide custome extender base on AjaxControlToolKit
HomeWiki:
• Custom extender base on AjaxControlToolkit*

Everything is studied, copied(reused, sound better :-) ) or modified from AjaxControlToolkit.
This poorly written project is only tested in IE7.


This project currently contain only 3 prototyped extenders.
  1. DropDownPanelExtender
  2. PopupPanelExtender (Now allow drag)
  3. TopMostPanelExtender (As an aid to AlwaysVisibleExtender from AjaxControlToolkit. To ensure it would covered by any popup panel)
